CustomField.formula: IF(Portfolio_from_Quote_Line_Item__c =='IP Routing', IF(ISBLANK( Apttus_Config2__PriceListItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceListId__r.NokiaCPQ_Price_List_Display_Name__c ) ,Apttus_Config2__PriceListItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceListId__r.Name , IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'USD'),Apttus_Config2__PriceListItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceListId__r.NokiaCPQ_Price_List_Display_Name__c = 'IRP (EUR)'), 'IRP(USD)', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'EUR'), Apttus_Config2__PriceListItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceListId__r.NokiaCPQ_Price_List_Display_Name__c = 'IRP (USD)'),'IRP (EUR)', Apttus_Config2__PriceListItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceListId__r.NokiaCPQ_Price_List_Display_Name__c))), IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'USD'),Apttus_Config2__PriceListItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceListId__r.NokiaCPQ_Price_List_Display_Name__c = 'CNP High (EUR)'),'CNP High (USD)', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'EUR'),Apttus_Config2__PriceListItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceListId__r.NokiaCPQ_Price_List_Display_Name__c = 'CNP High (USD)'),'CNP High (EUR)', Apttus_Config2__PriceListItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__PriceListId__r.NokiaCPQ_Price_List_Display_Name__c)))
CustomField.label: Price List
